Pre-Game Insights: Australia and Afghanistan are set to face off in Super 12 - Match 26 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Australia, 2022 at the Adelaide Oval, Adelaide on 4th November 2022 at 01:30 PM IST.
Australia is currently ranked third on the points table, while Afghanistan is ranked sixth.
In their previous encounter in this series, Australia beat Ireland by 42 runs, with Aaron Finch being the top fantasy player for Australia.
In their last match against Sri Lanka, Afghanistan lost by 6 wickets, with Mujeeb Ur Rahman being the top fantasy player for Afghanistan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Adelaide Oval, Adelaide is a balanced pitch, with the average 1st innings score being 155 runs.

Others: The match officials for the game are Aleem Dar (PAK), Langton Rusere (ZIM) and Adrian Holdstock (SA), with Ranjan Madugalle (SL) as the referee.
